description.value: With a barrage of blows, you diminish an enemy's strength. Strike an enemy affected by your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Taunt] twice. If either Strike hits, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1} until the beginning of your next turn. If both Strikes hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 3} instead.
